fields.description: The budget of the film in USD. Films with no budget data have 0 here.
How long the movie is in minutes.
The IMDb user rating for the movie.
The MPAA rating, from G (all ages) to NC-17 (no children under 17).
The month it was released in.
The year it was released in.

card.description: A dataset of movies released from 1986-2016, with box office numbers, ratings, IMDB scores, and more.

context.potentialUses: For example, determine a movie's box office by its budget or genre.
